abstract: Disney’s films have underperformed at the box office, even as the rest of Hollywood is enjoying a boom in ticket sales.
snippet: Disney’s films have underperformed at the box office, even as the rest of Hollywood is enjoying a boom in ticket sales.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  A lack of hit movies is starting to hit home at the Walt Disney Company.

headline.main: Struggles at the Box Office Weigh on Disney’s Profit
headline.print_headline: Struggles at the Box Office Weigh on Disney’s Profit
